channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-158] Move latest benchmarking code into trunk
item.description: Move the code we've been using for benchmarking into trunk.
item.summary: Move latest benchmarking code into trunk

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This is a pretty big patch, entirely confined to bookkeeper-benchmark, except for a small mod in the bookkeeper/bin/bookkeeper.

I've added a new script in bookkeeper-benchmark/bin/benchmark. To test the whole thing out, start a local bookie ensemble and run a bench against it.

bookkeeper-server/bin/bookkeeper localbookie 10 &
bookkeeper-benchmark/bin/benchmark writes

Calling bookkeeper-benchmark/bin/benchmark without any args will give you the possible benchmarks, and running each of these with -help will give you the options they take.

-----------------------------------------------------------
This is an automatically generated e-mail. To reply, visit:
https://reviews.apache.org/r/3706/
-----------------------------------------------------------

Review request for bookkeeper.

Summary
-------

Move the code we've been using for benchmarking into trunk.

This addresses bug BOOKKEEPER-158.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BOOKKEEPER-158

Diffs

bookkeeper-benchmark/bin/benchmark PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/conf/log4j.properties PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/pom.xml f005531
bookkeeper-benchmark/src/main/java/org/apache/bookkeeper/benchmark/BenchBookie.java PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/src/main/java/org/apache/bookkeeper/benchmark/BenchReadThroughputLatency.java PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/src/main/java/org/apache/bookkeeper/benchmark/BenchThroughputLatency.java PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/src/test/java/org/apache/bookkeeper/benchmark/TestBenchmark.java PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-benchmark/src/test/resources/log4j.properties PRE-CREATION
bookkeeper-server/bin/bookkeeper b0629bd

Diff: https://reviews.apache.org/r/3706/diff

Testing
-------

Thanks,

Ivan

+1, thanks Ivan. There was a small compilation issue with the patch, but I have fixed it. I'll upload the committed version.

Committed revision 1298825.

Integrated in bookkeeper-trunk #396 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/bookkeeper-trunk/396/)
BOOKKEEPER-158: Move latest benchmarking code into trunk (ivank via fpj) (Revision 1298825)

Result = ABORTED
